message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. Considering its value and quality, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This is a special offer tailored just for you, taking into account the high demand and limited availability of the product. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I appreciate your product, $15,000 is above my budget. I'm interested in purchasing, but I'm only able to offer $12,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
